ai-mn46:1.2_0: At one time the Buddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.
ai-mn46:2.1_0: “Mendicants, sentient beings typically have the wish, desire, and hope:
ai-mn46:2.2_0: ‘Oh, if only those things were unlikable, undesirable, and disagreeable things decrease.’
ai-mn46:2.3_0: But exactly the opposite happens to them.
ai-mn46:2.4_0: What do you take to be the reason for this?”
ai-mn46:2.5_0: “Our teachings are rooted in the Buddha.
ai-mn46:2.5_1: He is our guide and our refuge.
ai-mn46:2.5_2: The mendicants will listen and remember it.”
ai-mn46:2.6_0: “Well then, mendicants, listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-mn46:3.1_0: “Mendicants, take an uneducated ordinary person who has not seen the noble ones, and is neither skilled nor trained in the teaching of the noble ones. They’ve not seen good persons, and are neither skilled nor trained in the teaching of the good persons.
ai-mn46:3.2_0: They don’t know what practices they shouldn’t cultivate and foster, and what practices they shouldn’t cultivate and foster.
ai-mn46:3.3_0: So they cultivate and foster practices they shouldn’t, and don’t cultivate and foster practices they should.
ai-mn46:3.4_0: When they do so, unlikable, undesirable, and disagreeable things increase, and likable, desirable, and agreeable things increase.
ai-mn46:3.6_0: Because that’s what it’s like for someone who doesn’t know.
ai-mn46:4.1_0: But an educated noble disciple has seen the noble ones, and is skilled and trained in the teaching of the noble ones. They’ve seen good persons, and are skilled and trained in the teaching of the good persons.
ai-mn46:4.2_0: They know what practices they should cultivate and foster, and what practices they shouldn’t cultivate and foster.
ai-mn46:4.3_0: So they cultivate and foster practices they should, and don’t cultivate and foster practices they shouldn’t.
ai-mn46:4.4_0: When they do so, unlikable, undesirable, and disagreeable things increase, and likable, desirable, and agreeable things increase.
ai-mn46:4.6_0: Because that’s what it’s like for someone who knows.
ai-mn46:5.1_0: Mendicants, there are these four ways of taking up practices.
ai-mn46:5.3_0: There is a way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pain.
ai-mn46:5.4_0: There is a way of taking up practices that is pleasant now but results in future pain.
ai-mn46:5.5_0: There is a way of taking up practices that is painful now but results in future pleasure.
ai-mn46:5.6_0: There is a way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pleasure.
ai-mn46:6.1_0: When it comes to the way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pain, an ignoramus, without knowing this, doesn’t truly understand:
ai-mn46:6.2_0: ‘This is the way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pain.’
ai-mn46:6.6_0: Because that’s what it’s like for someone who doesn’t know.
ai-mn46:7.1_0: When it comes to the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pain, an ignoramus ...
ai-mn46:7.2_0: ‘This is the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now but results in future pain.’
ai-mn46:7.6_0: Because that’s what it’s like for someone who doesn’t know.
ai-mn46:8.1_0: When it comes to the way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pleasure, an ignoramus ...
ai-mn46:8.2_0: ‘This is the way of taking up practices that is painful now but results in future pleasure.’
ai-mn46:8.6_0: Because that’s what it’s like for someone who doesn’t know.
ai-mn46:9.1_0: When it comes to the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pleasure, an ignoramus ...
ai-mn46:9.2_0: ‘This is the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pleasure.’
ai-mn46:9.6_0: Because that’s what it’s like for someone who doesn’t know.
ai-mn46:10.1_0: When it comes to the way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pain, a wise person, knowing this, truly understands:
ai-mn46:10.2_0: ‘This is the way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pain.’
ai-mn46:10.3_0: So instead of avoiding that practice, they cultivate it.
ai-mn46:10.6_0: Because that’s what it’s like for someone who knows.
ai-mn46:11.1_0: When it comes to the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pain, a wise person ...
ai-mn46:11.2_0: ‘This is the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now but results in future pain.’
ai-mn46:11.3_0: So instead of avoiding that practice, they cultivate it.
ai-mn46:11.6_0: Because that’s what it’s like for someone who knows.
ai-mn46:12.1_0: When it comes to the way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pleasure, a wise person ...
ai-mn46:12.2_0: ‘This is the way of taking up practices that is painful now but results in future pleasure.’
ai-mn46:12.3_0: So instead of avoiding that practice, they cultivate it.
ai-mn46:12.6_0: Because that’s what it’s like for someone who knows.
ai-mn46:13.1_0: When it comes to the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pleasure, a wise person, knowing this, truly understands:
ai-mn46:13.2_0: ‘This is the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pleasure.’
ai-mn46:13.3_0: So instead of avoiding that practice, they cultivate it.
ai-mn46:13.6_0: Because that’s what it’s like for someone who knows.
ai-mn46:14.1_0: And what is the way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pain?
ai-mn46:14.2_0: It’s when someone in pain and sadness kills living creatures, steals, and commits sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view. Because of these things they experience pain and sadness.
ai-mn46:14.4_0: For someone in pain and sadness experiences wrong livelihood. Because of wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
ai-mn46:14.5_0: They lie even in pain and sadness.
ai-mn46:14.7_0: They experience pain and sadness because of speaking harshly.
ai-mn46:14.8_0: They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they experience pain and sadness because of these things.
ai-mn46:14.9_0: They experience pain and sadness because of their sadness.
ai-mn46:14.11_0: For one who had wrong view and sadness experienced pain and sadness because of wrong view.
ai-mn46:14.12_0: But when their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-mn46:14.13_0: This is called the way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pain.
ai-mn46:15.1_0: And what is the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now but results in future pain?
ai-mn46:15.2_0: It’s when someone with pleasure and happiness kills living creatures, steals, and commits sexual misconduct. They use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re covetous, malicious, with wrong view. Because of these things they experience pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:15.3_0: For by living with pleasure and happiness they experience pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:15.4_0: When you experience pleasure and happiness,
ai-mn46:15.6_0: When one is cleaned, divisive speech is a condition for pleasure and happiness. And they experience pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:15.7_0: For someone who feels pleasure and happiness experiences both kinds of harsh speech. And they experience pleasure and happiness because of that.
ai-mn46:15.8_0: When they talk nonsense in happiness, they experience pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:15.9_0: When you’re full of pleasure, happiness, and pleasure. And because of covetousness they experience pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:15.11_0: When I experience pleasure and happiness, wrong view experiences pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:15.12_0: But when their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a place of loss, a bad place, the underworld, hell.
ai-mn46:15.13_0: This is called the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now but results in future pain.
ai-mn46:16.1_0: And what is the way of taking up practices that is painful now but results in future pleasure?
ai-mn46:16.2_0: It’s when someone with pain and sadness doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view. Because of these things they experience pain and sadness.
ai-mn46:16.3_0: Not stealing is pain and sadness.
ai-mn46:16.4_0: For someone who refrains from pain and sadness refrains from sexual misconduct. They refrain from speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view.
ai-mn46:16.6_0: Not speaking divisively, harshly, or nonsensically pain, sadness, and distress.
ai-mn46:16.7_0: They refrain from harsh speech. They refrain from harsh speech.
ai-mn46:16.8_0: They refrain from talking nonsense. And they refrain from talking nonsense. Because of these things they experience pain and sadness.
ai-mn46:16.9_0: For someone with pain and sadness experiences pain and sadness.
ai-mn46:16.11_0: They experience pain and sadness because of one’s own pain and sadness.
ai-mn46:16.12_0: But when their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-mn46:16.13_0: This is called the way of taking up practices that is painful now but results in future pleasure.
ai-mn46:17.1_0: And what is the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pleasure?
ai-mn46:17.2_0: It’s when someone with pleasure and happiness doesn’t kill living creatures, steal, or commit sexual misconduct. They don’t use speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical. And they’re contented, kind-hearted, with right view. Because of these things they experience pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:17.3_0: Not stealing bypasses pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:17.4_0: Whenever they refrain from sexual misconduct, pleasure and happiness doesn’t experience pleasure and happiness because of these things.
ai-mn46:17.5_0: With one who refrains from pleasure and happiness. And they experience pleasure and happiness because of these things.
ai-mn46:17.6_0: When someone with pleasure and happiness doesn’t experience divisive speech. And they experience pleasure and happiness because of these things.
ai-mn46:17.7_0: Not speaking harshly with pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:17.8_0: When they refrain from talking nonsense, pleasure and happiness they refrain from talking nonsense. And because of these things they experience pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:17.9_0: With their own pleasure and happiness they experience pleasure and happiness.
ai-mn46:17.11_0: When one is full of pleasure and happiness, that is a condition for right view.
ai-mn46:17.12_0: But when their body breaks up, after death, they’re reborn in a good place, a heavenly realm.
ai-mn46:17.13_0: This is called the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pleasure.
ai-mn46:17.14_0: These are the four ways of taking up practices.
ai-mn46:18.1_0: Suppose there was some bitter gourd mixed with poison.
ai-mn46:18.2_0: Then a person would come along who wants to live and doesn’t want to die, who wants to be happy and recoils from pain.
ai-mn46:18.4_0: ‘Here, mister, this is bitter gourd mixed with poison.
ai-mn46:18.6_0: If you drink it, the color, aroma, and flavor will be unappetizing, and it will result in death or deadly pain.’
ai-mn46:18.7_0: He wouldn’t reject it. Without reflection, he’d drink it.
ai-mn46:18.8_0: The color, aroma, and flavor would be unappetizing, and it would result in death or deadly pain.
ai-mn46:18.9_0: This is comparable to the way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pain.
ai-mn46:19.1_0: Suppose there was a bronze cup of beverage that had a nice color, aroma, and flavor.
ai-mn46:19.3_0: Then a person would come along who wants to live and doesn’t want to die, who wants to be happy and recoils from pain.
ai-mn46:19.5_0: ‘Here, mister, this bronze cup of beverage has a nice color, aroma, and flavor.
ai-mn46:19.8_0: If you drink it, the color, aroma, and flavor will be appetizing, but it will result in death or deadly pain.’
ai-mn46:19.9_0: He wouldn’t reject it. Without reflection, he’d drink it.
ai-mn46:19.10_0: The color, aroma, and flavor would be appetizing, but it would result in death or deadly pain.
ai-mn46:19.11_0: This is comparable to the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pain, I say.
ai-mn46:20.1_0: Suppose there was some fermented urine mixed with different medicines.
ai-mn46:20.2_0: Then a person comes along with a swamp,
ai-mn46:20.4_0: ‘Here, mister, this is fermented urine mixed with different medicines. Drink it if you like.
ai-mn46:20.5_0: If you drink it, the color, aroma, and flavor will be unappetizing, but after drinking it you will be happy.’
ai-mn46:20.6_0: He wouldn’t reject it. After appraisal, he’d drink it.
ai-mn46:20.7_0: The color, aroma, and flavor would be unappetizing, but after drinking it he would be happy.
ai-mn46:20.8_0: This is comparable to the way of taking up practices that is painful now and results in future pleasure, I say.
ai-mn46:21.1_0: Suppose there was a person curds, honey, ghee, and molasses.
ai-mn46:21.2_0: Then a man with dysentery would come along.
ai-mn46:21.4_0: ‘Here, mister, this is curds, honey, ghee, and molasses all mixed together. Drink it if you like.
ai-mn46:21.5_0: If you drink it, the color, aroma, and flavor will be appetizing, but after drinking it you will be happy.’
ai-mn46:21.6_0: He wouldn’t reject it. After appraisal, he’d drink it.
ai-mn46:21.7_0: The color, aroma, and flavor would be appetizing, and after drinking it he would be happy.
ai-mn46:21.8_0: This is comparable to the way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pleasure, I say.
ai-mn46:22.1_0: It’s like the time after the rainy season when the sky is clear and cloudless. And when the sun rises, it dispels all the darkness from the sky as it shines and glows and radiates.
ai-mn46:22.2_0: In the same way, this way of taking up practices that is pleasant now and results in future pleasure dispels the doctrines of the various other ascetics and brahmins as it shines and glows and radiates.”
ai-mn46:22.3_0: That is what the Buddha said.
ai-mn46:22.4_0: Satisfied, the mendicants were happy with what the Buddha said.
ai-mn46:22.5_0: The sixth section on the Teaching is finished.
